title: Evenepoel Commits to Quick-Step, Pogačar Braces for ‘Even More Interesting’ Tour de France in Post-Merger Shakeout
content:
Remco Evenepoel quells transfer rumors, leaves potential for box-office battle with Primož Roglič, Jonas Vingegaard, Tadej Pogačar at 2024 Tour.

Read the full article at Evenepoel Commits to Quick-Step, Pogačar Braces for ‘Even More Interesting’ Tour de France in Post-Merger Shakeout on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
